version_description: Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Brrr..ing your gloves to the Two Dots 3.22 Shiver Village!

25 NEW LEVELS
Melt your heart playing 1410 levels of satisfying puzzles!

**Fixes bug that made the app crash at the end of the level for some users

[3.24.9: Additional bug fixes and new spring homescreen!]

ARRR. . . you ready to dock at Doubloon Isle?
1460 Puzzles that will get you hooked!

INTRODUCING BUBBLES
Bubbles are overtaking our dots! Can you pop them before they get to the top?

ALL NEW: TREASURE HUNT REWINDS!
Come reminisce and play Treasure Hunts of the past - and get great rewards!

Open the gates to Two Dots 3.18 Myriad Garden!
Now with iPhone X support!

INTRODUCING SEED DOTS
Match next to them to make them bloom

25 NEW LEVELS
Explore more than 1300 beautiful puzzles

BUG FIXES
No more missing buttons!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Step inside Two Dots 3.19 Ornate Manor

25 NEW LEVELS
Make Seed Dots bloom into rainbow flowers!

BUG FIXES
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

(3.19.2 Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.)

Step inside Two Dots 3.19 Ornate Manor

25 NEW LEVELS
Make Seed Dots bloom into rainbow flowers!

Warm yourself in the lush beauty of Two Dots 3.20 Botanical Greenhouse!

INTRODUCING GOLDEN KEYS!
Collect keys to unlock offers and bonuses.

ALL NEW PRESENT PURSUIT
Find all 25 hidden presents to win Golden Keys!

25 NEW LEVELS
New Seed Dots puzzles add to total of 1360 levels!

(3.20.2: Some bug fixes and stability improvements)

Tuck in to a delicious Two Dots 3.21 Winter Feast!

INTRODUCING SNOW
Snow drifts are piling up on our puzzles. Can you clear them?

25 NEW LEVELS
1385 levels of pure puzzle pleasure await you.

TUTORIALS IN YOUR LANGUAGE
Head to the Settings menu for tutorials in every language we support.

ALL NEW: TREASURE HUNT REWINDS!

Yo-Ho-Ho! More bubbly adventures have arrived in the Two Dots 3.25 Fearless Frigate!
1485 eye catching levels for you to explore!

Buckle up and grab your thinking cap! More Bubble levels have stormed the Two Dots 3.26 Buccaneer's Battle!

25 NEW LEVELS
All hands on deck for 1510 levels of puzzling adventures!

Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Take a dip into the Two Dots 3.27 Luminous Lake.
1535 enlightening puzzles to brighten your day!

INTRODUCING MOONSTONES
Make squares and trigger Moonstones into a cross shape explosion!

NOW SYNCING YOUR INVENTORY
Never lose your power-ups again! Connect your account with Facebook to save your progress and your power-ups.

Numerous bug fixes to prevent an issue where some users are temporarily or permanently losing power-up items.
Bug fixes related to problems with freezing during the Expedition.

TWO DOTS IS TURNING 4!
For a limited time, come celebrate Two Dots' 4th Birthday by playing our new hidden object mini game!
Take a stroll through the Two Dots 3.28 Enchanted Grove!
1560 levels of alluring puzzles are ready for you to solve!

Bug fixes to prevent an issue where some users are temporarily losing power-up items.
Bug fixes related to some users experiencing issues with the Treasure Hunt.

Bug fixes to prevent an issue where some users are temporarily losing power-up items.
Bug fixes related to some users experiencing issues with the Treasure Hunt.

Challenge the Verdant Giant in Two Dots 3.29!
1585 beautifully wild levels for you to explore!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

INTRODUCING FIREFLIES
Wake up and release Fireflies! Once released Fireflies hit other obstacles.

Take a heated adventure in the Two Dots 3.30 Flaming Flows.
Blaze through 1610 satisfying puzzles!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 3.31 is here!
Lose yourself in new levels along the Caldera Causeway.
Blaze a trail through 1635 challenging levels!

CHECK OUT OUR NEW LOOK
We have re-designed Two Dots for a better and more beautiful experience!
NOW SYNCING WITHOUT FACEBOOK
Never lose your power ups or progress! Introducing Two Dots Restore Codes, a new way to save your progress and play across multiple devices without having to connect to Facebook!

Update 3.32 is too hot to handle!
Try not to get burned in the Dragon’s Domain.
1660 new levels await you. Can you handle the heat?

NOW INTRODUCING GOLD!
Gold is coming soon to Two Dots players everywhere! Gold is an easier way to buy Power ups, Boosters, Moves, and Lives!

Update 4.1 is here:
NEW LEVELS have hatched in the Cactus Patch!
With 1685 levels to explore, the fiesta never stops!
NEW MECHANIC:
Smash your way through our brand new mechanic Ceramic Tiles.

Update 4.2 is here:
Get ready to tackle BRAND NEW LEVELS in the TILED TERRACE!
1710 challenging levels are yours for the taking.

Update 4.3 has arrived!
Encounter NEW LEVELS while exploring the Patterned Pueblo!
Show off your skills in 1735 exciting puzzles!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

A NEW LIMITED HALLOWEEN EVENT:
Stir up some trouble in our NEW HALLOWEEN EVENT by brewing magic potions for a variety of prizes!
Trade in your Golden Keys to start cooking up some powerful items to help you on your adventures!

NEW LEVELS and wonders await in the Fantastic Fairground!
Enjoy a wild ride of 1760 delightful levels!

NEW MECHANIC:
TARGET acquired! Keep a sharp eye out for our brand-new game mechanic: TARGETS.

Minor updates to Halloween Cauldron.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 5.5 has arrived:
Proceed with caution in the creepy new levels of the Cursed Corridor.
2235 puzzles are waiting, and only you can solve them.

Update 5.14 has arrived!
Take a stroll to the Troll’s Terrace for NEW LEVELS and new challenges.
There’s 2475 puzzles to solve—think you can handle it?
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

A new event is on its way and it’s going to have you flipping out!
Time flies when you’re making squares. It’s been five whole years since Two Dots first began and we’re excited to celebrate with all of you during our special event: The Five Year Flip.
Lookout for this fun fifth anniversary challenge coming in June!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 5.3 has arrived!
Your training is about to payoff in the Olympian Odyssey!
Take home the gold in 2185 challenging levels.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.12 is here!
We’re serving NEW LEVELS straight from the farm to your screen.
Show off your egg-hatching skills in the Rustic Roost.
Don’t wait; 1960 glorious levels have been calling your name since the crack of dawn.

Update 4.5 is here!
The fun never stops in Merriment Mountain; enjoy the ride with 1785 exciting levels!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.6 is now available
NEW LEVELS are making a splash in the River Rendezvous.
Go with the flow and get lost in 1810 entrancing levels!
Trouble finding squares?
Two Dots now has square hints that will remind you if you have a square on the board. Hints can also be turned off in the settings menu.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.7 has arrived!
NEW LEVELS and challenges have bloomed in the Granular Gardens!
1835 beautiful levels to explore!
NEW MECHANIC:
Light the way with our brand new mechanic, Lanterns.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

New Holiday Mini-Game!

Come celebrate the Holidays with Two Dots! For a limited time, we're featuring a winter hidden object mini-game!

Update 4.8 has arrived!
NEW LEVELS are here to brighten your day.
Explore the KOI POND and continue your mastery of LANTERNS!
With 1860 stimulating levels, the holiday season has just gotten way more interesting.

Update 4.9 has arrived:
Now that you’ve mastered lanterns, face the final challenge of the Secluded Shrine!
Find the perfect balance of relaxation and challenge in 1885 handcrafted levels.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.10 is here!
There’s NEW LEVELS and ample fun to be had at the Ample Farm.
Meet EGG DOTS, our eggcellent new mechanic that’s as cute as it is fun.
Enjoy 1910 levels hand-raised with farm-fresh gameplay!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

We’re serving NEW LEVELS straight from the farm to your screen.
Show off your egg-hatching skills in the Rustic Roost.

Update 4.13 is now available!
Head deep into the jungle to find new challenges in the Hidden Huts.
Take the weekend to do some monkeying around with our newest mechanic: Crates
1985 levels and counting: can you beat them all?

Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.14 has arrived!
Swing your way into the Primate Playhouse.
Triumph over obstacles by stealing back fruit from mischievous monkeys.
With wild 2010 levels, it’s a real jungle in here.

Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.15 has borne fruit!
If you’re ready for sweet, sweet challenges, you’ve come to the right place.
Journey to the Fruity Fort and show off your mastery of Crates.
Come claim nature’s bounty of 2035 levels.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.16 is now available!
Enter the INTERGALACTIC MACHINE to face new high-tech obstacles and a shocking new mechanic: ZAPPERS
There’s 2060 electrifying levels waiting to supercharge your day!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.17 is here!
With brand new levels, it’s all fun and games at the Astral Arcade.
2085 levels means 2085 opportunities to get the highest score!
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.
Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

Update 4.18 is now live!
Prove your mastery of Zappers to claim your place in the Gamers Gallery.
Take a break and find 2110 exciting levels that’ll recharge your week.

Prove your skill by making all the way to level 2260!

Ride along with us on a Road Trip Retreat. There’s nothing but new levels for miles!

A new update is here!
Tune in later this week for a tasty treat. Louie’s Fruity Flip is on the way!

Harness arcane powers with our newest mechanic ENCHANTED DOTS & SCROLLS.

We’re bringing back a fan favorite.
Get out your magnifying glass and start the Winter Festival Remind now!

This is the last scavenger hunt of 2019 so bring your most festive magnifying glass.

CHECK OUT OUR NEW FEATURE:
Introducing Win Streaks, gain boosters with every new level you beat!

Brave the Gelid Grotto for NEW LEVELS.

Chase the white rabbit and discover our newest mechanic: Mushroom Dots

When one door closes, another opens. Find new possibilities in the Doors Domain.

We're psyched to finally reach update 6.0!
This is a huge milestone which means huge things are on the way.
